name: Liberty Day 2217
description:
As Super Earth celebrates Liberty Day, thousands of Helldivers spread out throughout the galaxy are risking their lives to make sure this day can be celebrated in the years to come. In this mini game, you assume the role of a Helldivers lieutenant leading a squad on a mission in the Azurus system.

Disclaimer: the name HELLDIVERS and the HELLDIVERS logo belong to Arrowhead Game Studios and/or Sony Computer Entertainment America. The image used in the game was created by me based on the original game graphics.
